passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effects: After using an [[Champion ability|ability]], your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|200% '''base''' AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] ({{fd|1.5}} second cooldown, starts after using the empowered attack).

passives.name: Quicken
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] grant {{as|20 '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds
